long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet Time Calculator, the Chrome extension that helps you calculate hours and minutes you've worked in any given time period

🔑 Key Features 🔑

✅ Easily add your working hours and break times.
⏱️ Seamlessly track your worked hours and monitor remaining time at a glance.
📊 Stay organized with detailed logs and insights.

━ Get in Touch ━

Have questions or feedback? I'm here to help! Reach out to me via email.

━ Privacy Policy ━

Extension don't collect any data without your consent. Your trust and satisfaction are our top priorities.
